## infoResponse() function

sends http response using the appropriate output from service call

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function infoResponse(git: Git, repo: string, service: ServiceString, req: http.IncomingMessage, res: http.ServerResponse): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  git | [Git](./node-git-server.git.md) | an instance of git object |
|  repo | string | the repository |
|  service | [ServiceString](./node-git-server.servicestring.md) | the method that is responding infoResponse (push, pull, clone) |
|  req | http.IncomingMessage | http request object |
|  res | http.ServerResponse | http response |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
